citations.narrative:
The facility is not licensed to exhibit wild canids, but had two fennec foxes on exhibit at the time of inspection. Licenses
specifically authorize the use of animals in the canid category, and a new license is required before exhibiting animals not
authorized under the existing license. The facility must ensure that all animals on exhibit are authorized for exhibition.
Correct upon receipt of this report on 31 August 2023.

On August 27, 2023, a parakeet in the walk through aviary died of trauma after a member of the public accidentally
stepped on it. Small birds such as parakeets that cluster in groups near the feet of the public are at high risk of injury,
despite having a conscientious attendant in the aviary attempting to guide birds away from the ground near the public
walking through. The facility must assure the safety of the birds during public exhibition.
Correct from 08/28/2023 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
The facility is not licensed to exhibit wild canids, but had two fennec foxes on exhibit at the time of inspection. Licenses 
specifically authorize the use of animals in the canid category, and a new license is required before exhibiting animals not 
authorized under the existing license. The facility must ensure that all animals on exhibit are authorized for exhibition. 
 
Correct upon receipt of this report on 31 August 2023. 
2.131(c)(1)  Critical
   
Handling of animals. 
On August 27, 2023, a parakeet in the walk through aviary died of trauma after a member of the public accidentally 
stepped on it. Small birds such as parakeets that cluster in groups near the feet of the public are at high risk of injury, 
despite having a conscientious attendant in the aviary attempting to guide birds away from the ground near the public 
walking through. The facility must assure the safety of the birds during public exhibition.  
 
Correct from 08/28/2023 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
